nodes.documentation:
@dev Interface expected to be implemented by contracts added as a gas price
 oracle consumers. Consumers are notified by GasPriceOracle every time gas
 price change is finalized by calling their refreshGasPrice function. Each
 consumer may decide to pull the new value from the oracle immediatelly or
 at the moment right for the consumer.
 Consumers must be trusted contracts whose refreshGasPrice must always
 succeed and never consume excessive gas.
nodes.name: GasPriceOracleConsumer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Oracle presenting the current gas price. The oracle is manually
 updated by its owner.
nodes.name: GasPriceOracle
beginGasPriceUpdate

nodes.documentation:
@notice Finalizes the gas price update. Finalization may happen only
 after the governance delay elapses.
nodes.name: finalizeGasPriceUpdate
addConsumerContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes consumer contract from the oracle by its index.
 @param index Index of the consumer contract to be removed.
nodes.name: removeConsumerContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns all consumer contracts currently registered in the
 oracle.
nodes.name: getConsumerContracts

attributes.documentation:
@dev Interface expected to be implemented by contracts added as a gas price
 oracle consumers. Consumers are notified by GasPriceOracle every time gas
 price change is finalized by calling their refreshGasPrice function. Each
 consumer may decide to pull the new value from the oracle immediatelly or
 at the moment right for the consumer.
 Consumers must be trusted contracts whose refreshGasPrice must always
 succeed and never consume excessive gas.
attributes.name: GasPriceOracleConsumer

attributes.documentation:
@notice Oracle presenting the current gas price. The oracle is manually
 updated by its owner.
attributes.name: GasPriceOracle
beginGasPriceUpdate

attributes.documentation:
@notice Finalizes the gas price update. Finalization may happen only
 after the governance delay elapses.
attributes.name: finalizeGasPriceUpdate
addConsumerContract

attributes.documentation:
@notice Removes consumer contract from the oracle by its index.
 @param index Index of the consumer contract to be removed.
attributes.name: removeConsumerContract

attributes.documentation:
@notice Returns all consumer contracts currently registered in the
 oracle.
attributes.name: getConsumerContracts

params.consumerContract: The new consumer contract to add to the oracle.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.index: Index of the consumer contract to be removed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addConsumerContract(address).notice: Adds a new consumer contract to the oracle. Consumer contract is expected to implement GasPriceOracleConsumer interface and receives a notifcation every time gas price update is finalized.

beginGasPriceUpdate(uint256).notice: Initialize the gas price update. Change is finalized after the governance delay elapses.

finalizeGasPriceUpdate().notice: Finalizes the gas price update. Finalization may happen only after the governance delay elapses.

getConsumerContracts().notice: Returns all consumer contracts currently registered in the oracle.

removeConsumerContract(uint256).notice: Removes consumer contract from the oracle by its index.

userdoc.notice: Oracle presenting the current gas price. The oracle is manually updated by its owner.
